derivation: from an unused root meaning to hollow or curve; (compare H1460 (גֵּו) and H1479 (גּוּף))
outline:
1. convex surface, back
    1. back (of man)
    2. mound (for illicit worship)
    3. boss (convex projection of shield)
    4. bulwarks, breastworks (of arguments - fig.)
    5. brow, eyebrow
    6. rim (of wheel)
kjv_def: back, body, boss, eminent (higher) place, (eye) brows, nave, ring.
strongs_def: the back (as rounded); by analogy, the top or rim, a boss, a vault, arch of eye, bulwarks, etc.
